name: Slimes in Space
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED!

Created in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam (all assets were made in 48 hours)

Press R to restart (if you're stuck)

Theme: Joined Together

Code and Piano: Yotam Frid

Art and Flute: Mati Ernst

Animation and Bass: Itamar Ernst

Slimy sounds by: Neta Feldman & Dave Ben-Dor
